title: 24: No Such Thing As A Malicious Robot
content: Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Anna (@nosuchthing), and Alex (@alexbell) discuss the shape of the Sun, fake baseball fans, giant birds' nests and how to play Hooverball.
contentSnippet: Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Anna (@nosuchthing), and Alex (@alexbell) discuss the shape of the Sun, fake baseball fans, giant birds' nests and how to play Hooverball.
